shrimp.name: OrenNayar
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Oren-Nayar diffuse term. Kd controls overall intensity. Note that this is meant to be used in a network with an ambient term, and/or a specular term, if desired. A good starting point might be an Blinn specular term. Note that Cs and Os aren't taken into consideration, and must be added in your network, where proper/desired.
